channel.title: Client helps
channel.description: i see players putting downloads for clients well why do we need it does it make it so server has no lag and if i download a source that has a client how do players get on my server do they have to download the client to get in the server?

item.title: Client helps
item.dc:creator: @cccrrraaazzziii cccrrraaazzziii
item.description:
@cccrrraaazzziii wrote:

[quote=“O M G, post:3, topic:134713”]Clients can be linked directly to a server
They can have as many or as little options as they need
They can clear out junk and make it even faster
And to be honest they’re usually quicker anyway.[/quote]
He knows what he’s talking about .

Read full topic

item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

Clients can be linked directly to a server
They can have as many or as little options as they need
They can clear out junk and make it even faster
And to be honest they’re usually quicker anyway.

item.title: Client helps
item.dc:creator: @cccrrraaazzziii cccrrraaazzziii
item.description:
@cccrrraaazzziii wrote:

When you have a serer, your server doesn’t need the client. I’m not really a knowledgable person when it comes to clients but they are for the server’s use so you can connect straight to them when you use their client. Also some clients allow you too see features such as different skill icons that you wouldn’t see on the MoparScape Client. So in a way, a server’s client would have a more graphical and better game play side to the MoprScape client.

Read full topic
